details.description: ESDAL is the way for road hauliers to notify abnormal load movements to police, highways and bridge authorities
details.alternative_title: Electronic Service Delivery for Abnormal Loads (ESDAL) haulier application form
details.more_information:
You need to complete an online registration form for each person in your business who will use the system.

ESDAL lets you:

  • plan your route
  • notify the police, highways and bridge authorities of your abnormal indivisible load (AIL) movements around the road network
  • get advance notice of any possible route problems
  • save vehicle details and routes for future use

The ESDAL system is password protected and you’ll only be able to see your own company’s information.

Only your route information will be passed to the relevant authorities.
